title: Can't get past authenticating for one specific account.
body:
Similar issue to this thread [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/9jfKgoUT-league-sign-in-not-authenticating) where my friend gifted me a mystery skin, it didn't show, tried relogging, then couldn't log in. 
My friend borrowed me his account to try and login, and it worked. However it seems that this account can't get past authenticating. I've tried everything in the login issues page, but it seems its something glitched about this particular account. {{champion:32}}

replies.body: I have the EXACT same problem, friend bought me a skin, game froze when I tried to view it and when I try to login again its just authenticating for all eternity, been like this for 2 days now, tried basically everything I know, flushing dns, re-newing IP, restarting router & computer, Hextech Repair Tool, re-patching, empty cache, etc etc, nothing works..Only option left is to completely re-install league I guess.

We were having a little hiccup with the login servers earlier today, so I'm curious if that was the reason you couldn't get signed in. Let me know if you're still having this problem and I can look into it a little deeper.
Not sure if it's related, problem started last night at around 9. Still won't go past authenticating. What's strange is other accounts work fine, just not this one. {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

Hmmmm that is pretty heckin' strange that only the one account gets stuck =\ ....

I've looked over your account on my end and everything looks pretty normal, so let's get you in touch with our tech guys who should be able to look over your logs and figure out what's going on. Hit them up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to answer shortly!
Strange indeed. M0useRat has been responding to me and we're trying to get it fixed. Thanks for helping out :)
